snippet: Taliban suicide bombers killed at least a dozen Afghans and wounded 58 others outside the same American military outpost where a similar attack one year ago wounded scores of American soldiers.
abstract: Taliban suicide bombers kill at least a dozen Afghans and wound 58 others outside the same American military outpost near Kabul where a similar attack one year ago wounded scores of American soldiers.

byline.original: By RICHARD A. OPPEL Jr. and JAWAD SUKHANYAR
byline.contributor: An employee of The New York Times contributed reporting from Kabul.

lead_paragraph: Taliban suicide bombers killed at least a dozen Afghans and wounded 58 others outside the same American military outpost where a similar attack one year ago wounded scores of American soldiers.

headline.seo: U.S. Base in Afghanistan Target of Fatal Bomb Attacks
headline.main: Bombers Strike Outside U.S. Military Base in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Bombers Strike Outside U.S. Military Base in Afghanistan
